meanings.def: the process of making films, videos and computer games in which drawings, models or images of people and animals seem to move
a film in which drawings, models or images of people and animals seem to move
examples: The electronic dictionary included some animations.

meanings.def: energy and enthusiasm in the way you look, behave or speak
examples: His face was drained of all colour and animation.
She talked about her new job with great animation.
